snippet: In his first comments as prime minister, Li Keqiang offered a tantalizing palette of economic and social reforms that promised to transform the lives of the rural poor, migrants flooding into the cities and retirees.
abstract: Li Keqiang, in his first comments as China's prime minister, offers tantalizing palette of economic and social reforms that promises to transform the lives of the rural poor, migrants flooding into the cities and retirees; lays out vision of more equitable society in which government officials put the people's welfare before their own financial interests.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting, and Mia Li contributed research.

lead_paragraph: In his first comments as prime minister, Li Keqiang offered a tantalizing palette of economic and social reforms that promised to transform the lives of the rural poor, migrants flooding into the cities and retirees.

headline.seo: Li Keqiang, China’s Premier, Offers Plan of Economic and Social Reforms
headline.main: In China, New Premier Says He Seeks a Just Society
headline.print_headline: In China, New Premier Says He Seeks A Just Society
